Brief description: A large collection of Question to SPARQL specially design for Open Domain Neural Question Answering over DBpedia Knowledgebase.
Preprocessing: This dataset contains a large collection of Open Neural SPARQL Templates and instances for training Neural SPARQL Machines
Instances: it was pre-processed by semi-automatic annotation tools as well as by three SPARQL experts.
column10: Hartmann, Soru, and Marx et al.
